scripts.debug: NODE_ENV=development CIRCLE_SHA1=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) SLS_DEBUG=* node inspect ./node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless.js offline
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production CIRCLE_SHA1=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) rimraf ./build && tsc
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test CIRCLE_SHA1=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 mocha
scripts.test:debug: NODE_ENV=test CIRCLE_SHA1=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 mocha -- --inspect --inspect-brk
scripts.test:watch: NODE_ENV=test CIRCLE_SHA1=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 mocha --watch --watch-files src --watch-files test
scripts.deploy:test: NODE_ENV=test CIRCLE_SHA1=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) sls deploy --stage test
scripts.deploy: NODE_ENV=production CIRCLE_SHA1=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) sls deploy --stage $STAGE
